body_html: You may be running into problems because we try to compile TH.h as C code to check that we don't break the C FFI. So far we've avoided breaking that when we can. This might be tricky with THHalf because there may be a point where you really need the definition in the .h, and you can't do that because of the namespace. It might be possible to reorganize the code to avoid that, though.
body_text: You may be running into problems because we try to compile TH.h as C code to check that we don't break the C FFI.  So far we've avoided breaking that when we can.  This might be tricky with THHalf because there may be a point where you really need the definition in the .h, and you can't do that because of the namespace.  It might be possible to reorganize the code to avoid that, though.
body: You may be running into problems because we try to compile TH.h as C code to check that we don't break the C FFI.  So far we've avoided breaking that when we can.  This might be tricky with THHalf because there may be a point where you really need the definition in the .h, and you can't do that because of the namespace.  It might be possible to reorganize the code to avoid that, though.
